alert.note: Alert for Dickey; LaMoure; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 11:55AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... James River at Lamoure affecting Stutsman, Dickey and LaMoure Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River at Lamoure. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Urban flood stage. At 15.0 feet, Water starts to threaten the northwest side of town near the John Deere dealer. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The james river at lamoure will continue to crest near 14.6 feet until Saturday, before beginning a steady downward trend. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.5 feet on 04/06/2011. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
